name: Moroccanoil Treatment Purple Hair Oil for Blonde Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is: A tone-correcting hair oil to boost shine, smooth frizz, and detangle while gradually neutralizing brassiness in blonde, lightened, and grey hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Brassiness.- Dryness.- Shine..Key Benefits: - Neutralizes brassiness over time.- Helps hair look and feel healthier.- Protects against thermal damage..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: Is a rich source of vitamin E and antioxidants that hydrates and nourishes hair..- Linseed Extract: Is an essential fatty acid that improves hair’s health..- Violet Pigments: Neutralize brassy tones while enhancing depth and dimension...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Experience the benefits of the iconic argan-oil-infused hair treatment, now with brass-fighting violet pigments. The lightweight, multitasking formula counteracts brassiness with continued use, immediately restores vibrancy and radiance, and delivers long-term conditioning and softness...Fragrance Description: The fragrance blends spicy amber and sweet floral notes...Clinical Results: In an independent consumer test conducted on 75 respondents:.After just 1 use:.- 95% said it refreshed highlights..After 1 week of consistent use:.- 95% said it reduced brassiness.- 95% said it helped maintain blond tones between salon appointments..In instrument testing:.- It protected against thermal damage
ingredients: -Argan Oil: Is a rich source of vitamin E and antioxidants that hydrates and nourishes hair..-Linseed Extract: Is an essential fatty acid that improves hair’s health..-Violet Pigments: Neutralize brassy tones while enhancing depth and dimension...Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone, Parfum/Fragrance, Diethylhexyl Sodium Sulfosuccinate, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cl 60730 (Ext. Violet No. 2), Cl 60725 (Violet 2).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a small amount throughout damp or dry hair..-Style as usual..-Use two to three times a week or as needed..-Use consistently over time for best results..-For enhanced toning, use with Moroccanoil Blonde Perfecting Purple Shampoo and Conditioner (each sold separately)..-Note: Individual toning results may vary due to hair condition, starting color, porosity, and other factors.
